name: Apple-Cocoapod-KochavaAdNetwork
summary: The KochavaAdNetwork module of the KochavaTracker SDK for Apple iOS, macOS, macCatalyst, tvOS, and watchOS.
description: The KochavaAdNetwork module is an optional module within the Kochava SDK providing advertising network support, and is a high-level interface to Apple's SKAdNetwork.  This includes support or compatibility for iOS, macOS, macCatalyst, tvOS, and watchOS.  Complete SKAdNetwork support is provided on iOS and tvOS.
